# identifier

**Instance Property**

A unique identifier for the device.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

As an example [doc://com.apple.devicediscoveryextension/documentation/DeviceDiscoveryExtension/DDDevice/identifier] for Bluetooth devices, your extension can use the device’s local name (see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreBluetooth/CBAdvertisementDataLocalNameKey]).

## Identifying the device

- **displayName**: A name for the device to display to the user.
- **category**: An option that determies the icon that the picker UI displays for the device.
- **DDDevice.Category**: An option that determines the icon for the device in the picker UI.
